transcript.text: We all need to watch for conflicts of interest – times when our personal or private interests might affect our decisions and actions at work. In this module, we’ll discuss how to identify and handle potential conflicts.

panelText.text: In your work at Johnson Controls, it is your responsibility to recognize potential conflicts of interest and handle them appropriately.
Conflicts aren’t always obvious, particularly when we feel confident in our ability to remain objective, so it’s important to think critically about our own decisions and actions.

Conflicts arise from many common situations. The most important thing is for you to seek guidance and take the appropriate steps according to our guidelines. Many conflicts of interest can be avoided or resolved if they are disclosed early enough.
